Package sophiabcrypt.forms

Class SbcMainWindow

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
sophiabcrypt.forms.SbcMainWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SbcMainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
This class is a main GUI for SophiaBCrypt It shows a graphical interface for the user to select files or folders and to be able to choose the operations of Encrypt or Decrypt
Since:
June/2018
Author:
CesarBianchi
See Also:
SbcLanguageWindow, Serialized Form
